  • Methodendetails

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Description for the initialize method:

      In this Methode, the available difficulties are set. Also, a default value is set (Beginner).

      Angegeben von:
      initialize in Schnittstelle javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • switchToGame

      public void switchToGame() throws IOException
      Description for the switchToGame method:

      In this Methode, the game-view is shown in the current stage.

      Löst aus:
      IOException

    • getHighScores

      public void getHighScores()
      Description for the getHighScores method:

      In this Methode, the best times per difficulty is decided, and then displayed on the menu. If no record is available of the difficulty, N/A is displayed.
